entry.title: Trouble Shooting SUCKS
entry.content:
Actually Not That Hard

I thought I had lost all of my blog posts, but actually, git has saved my ass. I made the last two posts last week and tried to upload them, but for some reason my Virtualbox decided it didn’t want to connect to the internet anymore. After trying a restart I kept getting a kernel issue that I didn’t understand. Seems it’s actually just as easy to reinstall VB to solve the problem. So now I have all my files, despite the fact that I had to do all this. I am actually so relieved. I am being converted, ever so slowly.

entry.title: Music is Beautiful
entry.content:
I am the WORST at going to concerts

So I do love music. I really really do, it’s just that I’m not that great at leaving my house to go outside and actually going to the concerts. I don’t know what it is, the standing in a crowd, smelling all these random bodies and feeling their breath all around you. I just can’t motivate myself to go out and actually do it. Oh well. Well now I’ll just buy the EP of the bands I was going to check out and enjoy their music while supported them from the comfort of my own basement.

entry.title: DnD night
entry.content:
I was coding and forgot I had DnD night….

and now I’m making my GM come over and watch me make blog posts. I don’t know what this says about my social life, but it makes me happy.

Remember kids, use a calender for all of your important dates!

entry.title: I've never coded before
entry.content:
So guess what guys, this is my first time doing this!

Who knew, I’m using coding to make something awesome. Here here to THAT. Hopefully there’ll be some sort of content on here sometime soon. Or not. Yeeeah.

MARKDOWN YO
